beer_brewer_name: The Traveler Beer Company (formerly House Of Shandy)
review_blob: Not as sweet as I expected, I was expecting something similar to the summer shandy; this one is a little darker and the ginger/honey/lemon give it a more spicy less sweet flavor.  Id definitely recommend it for the foods suggested already: Indian, Thai, or Chinese would be perfect with this.  Not the best to drink by itself.
